#  Candidates -- AGH University Doctoral School

Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:54

 Candidates 

AGH University is 
one of 10 Polish universities
 awarded participation in the ministerial programme 'Initiative of Excellence – Research University' (IDUB). Among other things, the programme supports the careers of young scientists by offering:

increase
 of the doctoral 
scholarship
 for the best doctoral students

mini-grants to support research
 for doctoral students and young researchers

study trips and 
internships in international
 research 
centres

awards
 for scientific excellence

funding
 for open access 
publications
